entries.content: Get me a list of 10 crypto websites currently offering airdrops.

Here are 10 crypto websites currently offering airdrops. Please note that this information may be outdated by the time you read it, as new airdrop opportunities may arise or existing ones may expire:

1. <https://www.binance.com/en/register?ref=CZ3XNW9T> - Binance
2. <https://aerdrops.io/> - Airdrops.io
3. <https://airdropalerts.com/> - Airdrop Alerts
4. <https://crypto-airdrops.com/> - Crypto Airdrops
5. <https://www.coinspot.com/airdrops/> - CoinSpot
6. <https://cryptoairdrops.io/> - CryptoAirdrops.io
7. <https://cryptodaily.co.uk/airdrops/> - Crypto Daily
8. <https://www.cryptohunters.com/airdrops/> - Crypto Hunters
9. <https://airdropalerts.com/category/upcoming-airdrops/> - Upcoming Airdrops
10. <https://www.dapp.com/airdrops/> - Dapp.com Airdrops
